pull.title: configure: UniValue 1.0.4 is required for pushKV(, bool)
pull.body:
The breaking changes (#12193) are already merged, so this blocks 0.17.0.

It depends on jgarzik/univalue#42 or jgarzik/univalue#50 being merged and released in UniValue 1.0.4.

events.message: configure: UniValue 1.0.4 is required for pushKV(, bool)

events.body: Ah so this is what you meant the other day.

Isn't this merge premature given that 1.0.4. isn't [released](https://github.com/jgarzik/univalue/releases) yet? Or should there be a ticket in the 0.17 milestone to make sure 1.0.4 is released and compatible?
